```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(shiny)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
names <- read_csv('C:/Users/loganvj/Documents/NationalNames.csv')
```


```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
# Define UI ----
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("National Names"),
  
  sidebarPanel(
    textInput(inputId = 'lit', label = 'Desired Name', value = 'Logan')), 

  mainPanel(plotOutput('histogram')
  
))

# Define server logic ----
server <- function(input, output) {
  
  dataInput <- reactive({
    names %>% filter(Name == input$lit)
  })
  

  output$histogram <- renderPlot(
    
      dataInput() %>%
        ggplot() +
        geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = Year, y = Count), stat = 'identity') +
        theme_pander() +
        scale_fill_manual(values = c('dodgerblue')),
      width = 550,
      height = 300
    
  )
  
}

# Run the app ----
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
